name: ZETA-2000S Automated Fluid Dispenser
description: 4-fluid automated / manual dispenser for controlling and regulating the application of abrasives such as diamond, alumina, colloidal silica and lubricant solutions onto the polishing surface.

name: PENTA-5000A 5-Station Hand Grinder
description: 5-station hand grinder for coarse to fine grinding. Offers 5 stations with 240, 360, 600, 800 and 1200 grit abrasive.

name: OMEGA-AUTO-HB Automated Brinell Hardness Tester
description: Fully automated Brinell tester designed to evaluate metallographic specimen hardness. Testing range of ~8 to 650 HBW. One key operation.

name: OMEGA-RT-60/150 Semi-Automated Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Semi-automated digital Rockwell hardness tester. Features 60 Kgf, 100 Kgf and 150 Kgf loading, automatic conversion to 14 different hardness scales.

name: UCLEAN Ultrasonic Cleaner
description: Ultrasonic cleaner for sample cleaning.

name: OMEGA-HB Manual Brinell Hardness Tester
description: Basic economical manual Brinell tester designed to evaluate metallographic specimen hardness. Testing range of ~8 to 650 HBW. Test forces (kg) 62.5, 100, 125, 187.5, 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 3000.

name: MEGA-M250S Manual Abrasive Cutter
description: Manual wheel feed abrasive cutting machine for 10-inch (250 mm) abrasive blades.

name: IM-3000B Inverted Metallurgical Microscope
description: Inverted metallurgical microscope with Brightfield illumination. Includes 10X extra wide eyepiece, 4X, 10X, 20X, 50X and 100X infinite plan achromatic objectives, trinocular head, mechanical stage and color filters.

name: PICO-155S Precision Cutter
description: Precision cutter with touch-screen controls and built-in recirculating pump. Fits 3-inch (75 mm) up to 7-inch (175 mm) diameter blades. Variable speed 50-1500 rpm.

name: ALPHA-MHT-1000Z Micro Vickers Hardness Tester
description: Auto turret Micro Vickers hardness testing instrument for Vickers and Knoop indenters. Variable testing forces (10, 25, 50, 100, 200, 300, 500, 1000 gram load), 10X and 40X objectives.

name: OMEGA-DIGI-ST Semi-Automated Digital Superficial Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Semi-automated digital Superficial Rockwell hardness tester. Superficial Rockwell - 15 Kgf, 30 Kgr, and 45 Kgr loading.

name: NANO-1000S Manual Grinder Polisher
description: Single wheel grinder polisher bench top polisher for 8 and/or 10-inch wheels. Features variable speed (100-1000 rpm), 1 hp motor, preset fast speed buttons, and auto mode.

name: PENTA-7500S Belt Grinder
description: Wet or dry belt grinder for coarse grinding. Features a square grinding attachment to hold specimen mounts perpendicular during grinding.

name: OMEGA-RT Manual Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Manual basic low cost metallographic specimen Rockwell Hardness Tester. Load selection of 60, 100 and 150 Kgf (Rockwell).

name: ATTO-1000S Controlled Micro-Precision Polisher
description: Controlled micro-precision polisher for plano-parallel sample preparation.

name: TeraUV UV Curing Mounting System
description: UV light mounting chamber for accelerated castable curing resins. Fastest mounting cycles for high-volume cold mounting applications.

name: OMEGA-AUTO-RST Automated Dual Rockwell/Superficial Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Automated Dual Rockwell and Superficial Rockwell hardness tester. One touch operation, auto load change, auto lifting, auto loading, auto measuring, auto conversion.

name: PICO-155P Precision Cutter
description: Precision cutter with touch controls and built-in recirculating pump. Fits 3-inch (75 mm) up to 7-inch (175 mm) diameter blades. Variable speed 50-1500 rpm.

name: TP-7100S TERAPRESS Pneumatic Mounting Press
description: Programmable pneumatic automated mounting press with easy force control. Features 1-inch to 2-inch interchangeable or fixed heater/molds, rapid ram movement, multiple cooling modes, and automatic programmable cycles.

name: TeraVAC Vacuum Impregnation System
description: Vacuum impregnation system for room-temperature mounting. Removes air bubbles for clear mounts without heat application.

name: MEGA-T400S Manual Abrasive Cutter
description: Manual wheel and table feed abrasive cutting machine for 16-inch (400 mm) abrasive blades.

name: MEGA-T250S Manual Abrasive Cutter
description: Manual wheel and table feed abrasive cutting machine for 10-inch (250 mm) abrasive blades.

name: FEMTO-1100S Automatic Polishing Head
description: Automatic polishing head for use with NANO-1000S or NANO-2000S. Variable speed (0-200 rpm), pneumatically adjustable individual pistons for 1 to 6 specimens independent of each other.

name: FEMTO-1500S Dual Mode Automatic Polishing Head
description: Dual individual and central automatic polishing head for use with NANO-1000S or NANO-2000S. Can polish 1-6 specimens independently or 3-6 using fixed central force for superior flatness.

name: OMEGA-AUTO-RT Automated Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Automated digital Rockwell hardness tester. One touch operation, auto load change, auto lifting, auto loading, auto measuring, auto conversion, data transmission.

name: MEGA-T350A Automated Abrasive Cutter
description: Automated / manual Y-axis with automated X-axis table feed and manual wheel feed abrasive cutting machine for 14-inch (350 mm) abrasive blades. Cutting capacity up to 4.5-inch (115 mm) solid stock.

name: OMEGA-RT2 Manual Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Manual basic low cost metallographic specimen Rockwell Hardness Tester. Load selection of 60, 100 and 150 Kgf (Rockwell).

name: FEMTO-2500S Dual Mode Automatic Polishing Head
description: Dual individual and central automatic polishing head for use with NANO-1200S. Can polish 1-6 specimens independently or 3-6 using fixed central force for superior flatness.

name: VM-100 Digital Stereo Microscope
description: Digital stereo microscope with 0.7X ~ 4.5X electronic magnification with a zoom ratio of 6.5:1. Ideal for low magnification documentation of metallographic specimens prior to polishing and grinding.

name: ALPHA-MHT-2000Z2 Precision Micro Vickers Hardness Tester
description: Auto turret precision Micro Vickers hardness testing instrument for Vickers and Knoop indenters. Features include an auto turret head, large LCD screen.

name: SPEC-STORE Storage Cabinet
description: Storage cabinet with 10 stainless steel drawers. Fits two 1-inch (25 mm), 1.25 (30 mm), 1.5-inch, 40 mm and 2-inch (50 mm) specimen storage trays per drawer.

name: NANO-2000S Dual Wheel Grinder Polisher
description: Double wheel grinder polisher bench top polisher for 8 and/or 10-inch wheels. Features variable speed (100-1000 rpm), 1 hp motor, preset fast speed buttons, and auto mode.

name: FEMTO-2200S Automatic Polishing Head
description: Automatic polishing head for use with NANO-1200S. Variable speed (0-200 rpm), pneumatically adjustable individual pistons for 1 to 6 specimens independent of each other.

name: PICO-200A Automated Precision Cutter
description: Automated high speed table saw for precision cutting.

name: OMEGA-SRT-15/150 Automated Digital Rockwell/Superficial Rockwell Tester
description: Automated digital Rockwell / Superficial Rockwell Testing machine. Load selection of 60, 100 and 150 kgf (Rockwell) and 15, 30 and 45 kgf (Superficial Rockwell).

name: GIGA-S Vibratory Polisher
description: 9 or 12-inch metallurgical vibratory polisher. Designed to prepare even the most difficult to polish materials with a very gentle polishing action. Ideal for EBSD preparation.

name: RC-1000A Recirculating Tank
description: Recirculating tank for NANO Polishers, includes tank, filter housing, pump, coarse, medium and fine filters.

name: MEGA-TANK Recirculation Tank
description: Recirculation / cooling tank with pump for MEGA series abrasive cutters.

name: MEGA-T300A Automated Abrasive Cutter
description: Automated / manual Y-axis with automated X-axis table feed and manual wheel feed abrasive cutting machine for 12-inch (300 mm) abrasive blades. Cutting capacity up to 4-inch (100 mm) solid stock.

name: MEGA-T300S Manual Abrasive Cutter
description: Manual wheel and table feed abrasive cutting machine for 12-inch (300 mm) abrasive blades. Cutting capacity up to 4-inch (100 mm) solid stock.

name: OMEGA-DIGI-RT Semi-Automated Digital Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Semi-automated digital Rockwell hardness tester. Color touch screen, motorized control of loading, dwell, and unloading. Rockwell - 60 Kgf, 100 Kgf and 150 Kgf loading.

name: PICO-200S Manual Precision Cutter
description: High speed (500-3000 rpm) manual variable speed table saw for precision cutting.

name: OMEGA-AUTO-ST Automated Superficial Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Automated Superficial Rockwell hardness tester. One touch operation, auto load change, auto lifting, auto loading, auto measuring, auto conversion.

name: ZMS0745T Trinocular Stereo Microscope
description: Trinocular stereo microscope with magnification range of 7X to approximately 45X. Ideal for low magnification documentation of metallographic specimens prior to polishing and grinding.

name: TeraVAC Pro Vacuum Impregnation System
description: Programmable castable vacuum impregnation chamber. Removes air bubbles for clear, bubble-free mounts essential for precision work and delicate samples.

name: IM-5000 Inverted Metallurgical Microscope
description: Inverted metallurgical microscope features bright-field, dark field, polarized light and differential interference contrast (DIC) illumination. Objectives include 5X, 10X, 20X, 50X and 100X.

name: MEGA-T350S Manual Abrasive Cutter
description: Manual wheel and table feed abrasive cutting machine for 14-inch (350 mm) abrasive blades. Cutting capacity up to 4.5-inch (115 mm) solid stock.

name: MEGA-T400A Automated Abrasive Cutter
description: Automated / manual Y-axis with automated X-axis table feed and manual wheel feed abrasive cutting machine for 16-inch (400 mm) abrasive blades.

name: NANO-1200S Manual Grinder Polisher
description: Single wheel grinder polisher bench top polisher for 12 and/or 14-inch wheels. Features variable speed (100-1000 rpm), 1.5 hp motor, preset fast speed buttons, and auto mode.

name: VM-500PLUS Digital Stereo Microscope
description: Digital stereo microscope with autofocus and built-in measurement capabilities. 0.7X ~ 4.5X electronic magnification with a zoom ratio of 6.5:1.

name: OMEGA-ST Manual Superficial Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Manual basic low cost metallographic specimen Superficial Rockwell Hardness Tester. Load selection of 15, 30 and 45 Kgf (Superficial Rockwell).

name: ALPHA-MHT-1000VK Dual Vickers/Knoop Microhardness Tester
description: Dual Vickers/Knoop microhardness tester with auto turret instrument for Vickers and Knoop indenters independently. Variable testing forces (10, 25, 50, 100, 200, 300, 500, 1000 gram load), 10X, 20 and 40X objectives.

name: OMEGA-HB-3000 Digital Brinell Hardness Tester
description: Digital Brinell tester for a testing range of ~8 to 650 HBW. Measurement is incorporated into unit with results displayed on a LCD screen.

name: OMEGA-5000-VZ Semi-Automated Macro Vickers Hardness Tester
description: Semi-automated Macro Vickers hardness testing instrument with auto shifting between indenter and objective lens. Variable testing forces (1, 2, 2.5, 3, 5, 10, 20, 30 and 50 kilogram load).

name: OMEGA-DIGI-RST Semi-Automated Dual Rockwell/Superficial Rockwell Hardness Tester
description: Semi-automated digital dual Rockwell / Superficial Rockwell hardness tester. Rockwell/ Superficial Rockwell - 15 Kgf, 30 Kgr, 45 Kgr, 60 Kgf, 100 Kgf and 150 Kgf loading.

name: TP-7500S TERAPRESS Hydraulic Mounting Press
description: Programmable electro-hydraulic automated compression mounting press with interchangeable molds. Features 1-inch to 2-inch interchangeable or fixed heater/molds, rapid ram movement, multiple cooling modes, and automatic programmable cycles.

name: TP-TANK TERAPRESS Recirculation Tank
description: TERAPRESS recirculation / cooling tank with pump.
